Control Name: Implements Boundary Protection Systems—Boundary protection systems (for example, firewalls, demilitarized zones, and intrusion detection systems) are implemented to protect external access points from attempts and unauthorized access and are monitored to detect such attempts.

control_attributes.Control: Implements Boundary Protection Systems—Boundary protection systems (for example, firewalls, demilitarized zones, and intrusion detection systems) are implemented to protect external access points from attempts and unauthorized access and are monitored to detect such attempts.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.6 The entity implements logical access security measures to protect against threats from sources outside its system boundaries.
